name: s3-lambda-ffmpeg-mov-to-mp4-s3
description: A Serverless Application Repository Component for converting MOV files from one S3 bucket, into MP4 files to another S3 bucket.

scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file output.yml --s3-bucket video-convert-app-repo-components-gnews
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yml --stack-name s3-lambda-ffmpeg-video-convert-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy

author: Aleksandar Simovic <alexander.simovic@gmail.com>
